name: 3dDeconvolve
author: AFNI Team
description: Program to calculate the deconvolution of a measurement 3D+time dataset with a specified input stimulus time series.

inputs.description: Number of input stimulus time series.
inputs.name: Number of Stimulus Time Series

inputs.description: Filename of kth time series input stimulus.
inputs.name: Stimulus File

inputs.description: Kth input stimulus is part of the baseline model.
inputs.name: Stimulus Baseline

inputs.description: Deconvolution response model for kth stimulus.
inputs.name: Stimulus Times

inputs.description: Prefix for 3D+time output dataset which will contain the kth estimated impulse response.
inputs.name: Estimated Impulse Response

inputs.description: Prefix for 3D+time output dataset which will contain the (full model) time series fit to the input data.
inputs.name: Fitted Time Series

inputs.description: Flag to output the F-statistics for each stimulus.
inputs.name: Output F-Statistics

inputs.description: Create one AFNI 'bucket' dataset containing various parameters of interest.
inputs.name: Bucket Dataset

inputs.description: Save the regression coefficients (no statistics) into a dataset.
inputs.name: Coefficient Bucket

inputs.description: Save X matrix to a .xmat.1D (ASCII) file.
inputs.name: X-Matrix Output

inputs.description: Run the program with multiple jobs (sub-processes).
inputs.name: Number of Jobs

output-files.description: Main output bucket dataset in AFNI format.
output-files.name: Output Bucket Dataset

output-files.description: Regression coefficients stored in a dataset.
output-files.name: Coefficient Dataset

output-files.description: Fitted Time Series dataset in AFNI format.
output-files.name: Fitted Time Series Dataset
